summary: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Kate Bosworth|Geoffrey Rush|Danny Huston|Tony Cox|Lung Ti|Analin Rudd|Markus Hamilton|Rod Lousich|Matt Gillanders|Christina Asher|Jed Brophy|Carl Bland|Ian Harcourt|Tony Wyeth|Ryan Richards|Nic Sampson|Ashley Jones|Phil Grieve|Eddie Campbell|Ebony Sushames|Aimee Renata|Patricia Santana|Isbert Ramos|Ross Duncan|Makoto Murata|Chontelle Melgren|Cath Harkins|Neill Rea|Elliott Officer|Ken Smith|Jo Youngmin|Helene Wong|Han-garl Lee|Michael Deane|Ken McColl|David Austin|Brent Crozier|Matthew Burgess|Phoenix Brown Rigg|Peter Daube|John Rawls|Itai Biran|Josh Randall|Andy Conlan|Matthew Morris|Reuben de Jong|Robert Wootten|Wayne Gordon|Brenton Surgenor|Richard Coningham|Angela McInerney|Sandra Terry|Louise Shadbolt|Anna Giordani|Eoin McDonald
title: El camino del guerrero
